description.description: My portfolio is a way to display the work that I've completed. Needing an online presence to portray some of my projects, this site came to life. I designed and developed the website using React, Gatsby, Contentful CMS and Netlify to host the website. I used Sass with the CSS for more manageable files and code structure. I also implemented some small CSS animations such as the typing animation in the banner. I used GraphQL to pull the data from Contentful to display it on the site. Each project page is also dynamic and adding a new project on Contentful will create a new page to the site.
